item.title: Custom yell..HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @iCharizard iCharizard
item.description:
@iCharizard wrote:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Yourname")) { titles = "@dre@[Co Owner Dan]-"; }

I don’t know, I didn’t check how to do this per say, but perhaps this concept of doing it would work.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@bla[Mod]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@bla@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@dre@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@or3@[Donator]- @dre@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@bla@[Mod]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@bla@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@dre@[Owner]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@bla@[Admin]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@bla@[Mod]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@bla@[Admin]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@dre@[Owner]- ";
            }
   		 if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Yourname")) {
    		titles = "@dre@[Co Owner Dan]-";
	}
            if (donator == 4 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@dre@[Co Owner Dan]-";

              yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Custom yell..HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @hostile101 hostile101
item.description:
@hostile101 wrote:

could anyone help me make a totally new custom yell for myself and myself only? like for example [Co Owner Dan]
here is my yell stuff if u need it.

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@bla[Mod]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@bla@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@dre@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@or3@[Donator]- @dre@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@bla@[Mod]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@bla@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@dre@[Owner]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@bla@[Admin]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@bla@[Mod]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@bla@[Admin]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@dre@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 4 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@dre@[Co Owner Dan]-";

              yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

}

Read full topic
